alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:09AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Putnam, eastern Defiance, eastern Paulding, Henry and northeastern Van Wert Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 209 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcclure, or near Napoleon, moving southeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Leipsic and Deshler around 220 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northwestern and west central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert
